title: Andy’s Rise of the Ronin Impressions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.15.24
description:

We’re here to talk about video game news!

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:23 - Housekeeping
 - PAX EAST: Game Showdown LIVE is coming to PAX East with Bless and a crew of guests! If you wanna watch Kinda Funny's Trivia Show LIVE in the PAX audience, it's going down Friday, March 22nd at 1pm in the Albatross Theater.
 - Mike is Hosting the Grounded Panel
 - Blessing Hosting the Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty Panel
00:10:03 - Andy’s Rise of the Ronin Preview
        -  The Roper Report   -
00:21:52 - ‘Among Us’ Animated Series get a Voice Cast
00:27:52 - Palworld Dev Says Massive Profits Are ‘Too Big for a Studio With Our Size to Handle’
00:40:00 - Hyper Light Breaker Launches in Early Access This Summer
00:44:41 - Saber Confirms Continued Work On "A Number Of Titles" Including Space Marine 2
00:46:16 - Nintendo Seems To Have Changed Something About Its Game Releases
01:00:11 - Wee News!
01:02:13 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: No Show!
